column4: Hey everyone. Could I get some help? I'm having some problems with ssh. I had it set up fine, and it was working, and I was even using git with ssh to push to a server. My keys were also working properly. However, suddenly it stopped working, and I haven't tried to make any changes. This started with an attempt to access my server through ssh, and it told me that the host rsa key did not match, which was strange. I deleted the known_host
there was an update to ssh some time ago.. if you haven't done your updates in a while that might be what happened
oh.. no.. there was an update where after the update you had to generate new keys.. but this was.. something like a couple of months ago
oh.. well.. then I don't really know
